recipesJson.name: Nancy Pelosi on Acid
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
Continuing the Nancy Pelosi Theme of the evening from Fresh From the Kitchen, after a little ATM, Pelosi hits the clubs to "Feel The Music".

My Re-Mix of Pony on Acid.  If you're looking for a legit version I'd probably run all Capella.

Took some ideas from Folk Art's Rudloph on Acid, but ran it more towards something I'd enjoy for myself.

reviews.text: Absolutely delicious recipe. I went balls deep and mixed up 250ml straight off the bat. Why through half that bottle in 2 days üôàüòÇ

For the name and pic alone this deserves 5 Stars ‚≠êÔ∏è Lol. Everything blends well and tastes great. Like that you with jf sweet strawberry over the typical pairing of CAP sweet sb with CAP sb and cream.
